R

rand - Static variable in class zombiehouse.common.LevelVar
Is the single instance of Random used by all of level generation (It's seed is saved in level as it is not as public a variable)
random - Static variable in class zombiehouse.audio.AudioFiles
 
RandomWalkZombie - Class in zombiehouse.level.zombie
RandomWalkZombie class contains the behavior for a RandomWalkZombie
RandomWalkZombie(double, double, double, Tile, int) - Constructor for class zombiehouse.level.zombie.RandomWalkZombie
Creates a RandomWalkZombie that behaves uniquely
randomZombieSound() - Static method in class zombiehouse.audio.AudioFiles
Retrieves a random zombie-related sound.
rebuildLevel() - Method in class zombiehouse.graphics.MainApplication
Informs the program that a level rebuild has been requested.
remainingCameraPan - Static variable in class zombiehouse.common.InputContainer
 
RestartButton - Class in zombiehouse.graphics
This is used in the eng game dialog to restart the game
RestartButton(Level, Stage, MainApplication.GameLoop) - Constructor for class zombiehouse.graphics.RestartButton
This button will restart the game by resetting everything, then starting game loop and closing the end game dialog.
restartLevel() - Method in class zombiehouse.level.house.Level
restartLevel() should be called when the player is killed by a zombie resets the appropriate variables, re-seeds randomw then creates a new ProGen
right - Static variable in class zombiehouse.common.InputContainer
 
run - Static variable in class zombiehouse.common.InputContainer
